body: "[But it is less common for us to examine the ways we might wield the power we already have. Among the most potent of these powers is the knowledge of our own experiences. The women who used the spreadsheet, and who spread it to others, used this power in a special way, and I’m thankful to all of them](https://www.thecut.com/2018/01/moira-donegan-i-started-the-media-men-list.html)."
